page.title: 01Fremington Area.
page.content: In our grid area we have an oil refinery called the Depot. In the village we have quite a lot of shops. We have a supermarket, post office, and a chemist.Across the estuary we have an air base but the problem with an air base near you is that the noise is awful especially when thay do night flying. In the village we have a garage and next to that there is a cafe that does bed and breakfast.We are lucky because we have a Doctor and Dentist so it saves going in to the nearest town, which is Barnstaple. by Ian Monson.
